main.name: MD. ABU MUSA
main.bio: Welcome! I am AbuMusa a highly skilled and passionate full-stack developer with a Master's in Engineering (ICT). With over 4 years of industry experience, I have a strong foundation in web development and a deep understanding of modern technologies.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: My specialties include quickly learning new skills and programming languages, problem solving, responsive design principles, and MVVM and MVC method of organizing code. I am an expert in NodeJS(expressjs & nestjs).Beside that, I have C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python,GoLang, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, NextJS,Redux,MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Prisma, TypeORM,docker and Git/Github under my belt. My next target is to learn devOps and CICD concepts.

education.degree: M.Sc. Engg. in Information and Communications Technology

education.description: Graduated with a CGPA 3.91 out of 4.00

work.title: Full-Stack Developer (Remote)
work.description: My responsiblity was to implement robust and scalable server-side applications using modern programming languages such as Node.js or Golang. Build and optimize databases (SQL or NoSQL) to handle large amounts of data efficiently,  testing, deployment, and ongoing apps maintenance. I have developed 6+ production level application backend for them.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer (Remote)
work.description: My responsiblity was to engage in the complete software development life cycle, from gathering requirements and planning to coding, testing, deployment, and ongoing maintenance. I have developed full backend apis with swagger documentation and many crucial feature for them.

work.title: Full-Stack MERN Specialist
work.description: My responsiblity was to develop and integrate RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between the front-end and back-end components. Ensure data security and efficient data transfer. I have developed 5+ production level application for them. www.foodjocky.com was best among them.

testimonials.text: You made it so simple. My new site is so much faster and easier to work with than my old site. I just choose the page, make the change and click save.Thank You!
